message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. Considering its quality and features, I propose a price of $110 for you to experience all it has to offer.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I believe we can find a middle ground. How about considering $100 for the product?
